title: Hey Laughing Fish I haz a question for you.
body:
What would you change your name to if you were forced to change it?

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-MY6f3V6uZ2g/VgAUxJDRgXI/AAAAAAAAt08/InPS61RxOeg/s1600/v9erxD6.gif

replies.body:
Hmm... I would have to change my name to Laughing Fish.
